keyFacts: The document is an emergency contact form dated October 18, 2018.
It lists Donald Po4lon (likely Donald Pollon) as an employee with the title/position of Pilot for LSJE, LLC.
LSJE, LLC is associated with Jeffrey Epstein's operations, particularly in the Virgin Islands.
The form includes personal details such as address, contact information, and health data for the employee.
The email domain 'thesaintjames.group@gmail.com' is associated with Epstein's Saint James Group.
